modules.name: Scanning Clock Multiplier
modules.description: Create a list of clock ratios, then scan through the list.

modules.name: Phase-Driven Multihit Envelope
modules.description: A clocked function generator that derives up to 16 envelopes from a clock cycle, with facilities to warp and skew the position of the envelopes.

modules.name: Scanning Frequency Division Oscillator
modules.description: Polyphonic oscillator with thru-zero FM, windowed sync, and a unique scannable frequency-division parameter.

modules.name: Melody Transformer
modules.description: Quantizer with user-defined master scale and sub-scales. Pre-quantization processing utilities include gain, offset, and a 16-step polyphonic looper
